content.item: Newly added 3rd party service feature --- “Auto-reply for transfers”；users can set the amount YOYO they would like to charge for their valuable information, and other users in need can pay that amount YOYO to receive that information.
Fully Upgraded UI, optimized a large portion of user interaction experience.
Added token issuance related features, such as token creation, token issuance, token transfer and transaction details.
Added display function for user-freely-selected token types.
Overall layout optimization, added bottom navigation.
User experience optimizaion, added transition effects between pages.
QR code can be set up for collection
You can create and manage contacts
Wallet can be created and managed
Can quickly generate backup QR code
Quick scan backup QR code import wallet
